amendment.description: To provide funding for maintaining a robust long range bomber force including 94 B-52 aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3139 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3139 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S2261-2262; text: CR S2262) To provide funding for maintaining a robust long range bomber force including 94 B-52 aircraft.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3139 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3139 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Landrieu.
